author: Reuters
title: World stocks turn negative as coronavirus death toll mounts
description: 'After the market rallying, we are having some consolidation as we are in a bottoming process'
content:
LONDON — World stocks turned negative on Wednesday as the coronavirus death toll mounted and eurozone finance minister failed to agree a rescue package to help economies recover from the impact of the outbreak.
COVID-19 hospitalizations seemed to be levellin… [+3932 chars]
